### Nested Schema for `aspath_entries`

Required:

- `name` (String)

Optional:

- `action` (String) Permit or Deny (default) this BGP AS-Path Access-List Entry
- `aspath_regex` (String) Set regular-expression (1234567890_^|[,{}()]$*+.?-\) to match the BGP AS path
